title: Zelenskyy says will meet Trump next week as Russia intensifies attacks
summary: Russia carried out one of its largest aerial attacks overnight, firing 40 missiles and some 580 drones at Ukraine in a barrage that killed at least three people and wounded dozens, Volodymyr Zelenskyy said oSeptember 20.

title: Russia launches large-scale attack on Ukraine, killing three and wounding dozens
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said attacks took place across nine regions, including Dnipropetrovsk, Mykolaiv, Chernihiv, Zaporizhzhia, Poltava, Kyiv, Odesa, Sumy and Kharkiv.

title: ‘Much-needed message’: Indian envoy lauds Ireland’s leadership for condemning ‘misdirected’ attacks on community
summary: Last month, an Embassy advisory urged Indian citizens to take "reasonable precautions for their personal security” following a series of racially aggravated attacks

title: Cyberattack disrupts check-in, boarding systems at major European airports including London’s Heathrow
summary: Authorities at Berlin's Brandenburg Airport said a service provider for passenger handling systems was attacked on Friday (September 19) evening

title: U.S. House approves resolution honouring Charlie Kirk amid opposition by dozens of Democrats
summary: “Who could vote against that?” President Donald Trump said Friday (September 19) afternoon about the resolution
